Text:
Everybody who knows anyone with an active sexual life should be referred to this show.

Thanks TV Team and keep this series alive please.

Classification: Documentary
Genre: Current Events | Medical
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: October 24, 2012

Unsafe in the City examines how unsafe unprotected sex is and how it effects Britain's youth as it follows life at a Manchester STI clinic.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32426)
